name: Peace is Your Destiny
description:
Peace is Your Destiny is a relaxing trip across an everlasting and colorful ocean. Clear islands by rolling your cube to match colored tiles. You will uncover surprises along the way towards a calmer and chill mindset. Created for players to enjoy calming puzzles and retreat into a beautiful minimalist world.


  • Specially Designed for the People who Suffering from Anxiety or Stress



  • Simple tile matching gameplay that is easy to learn but hard to master.



  • Endless islands to complete - built to generate millions of unique layouts and color combinations.



  • Colorful minimalist visuals that constantly change as you play.



  • Hidden secrets to discover along the journey.



  • Having Stress or Anxiety just play Peace is Your Destiny
